title: Scp 8642 27
content:
You click through page after page of choices, sometimes following the path that lead you here and sometimes deviating radically from it. You lose track of time seeing all the possible outcomes that your day could’ve led to if you’d made one or two different choices. Sometimes different choices lead to the same outcome, and sometimes they lead to outcomes so different you can’t believe they could’ve happened.

Clicking through the pages eventually lands you to a page that simply says:

[[div class="sexy-box"]]

[[=]]
What led you here?
[[/=]]
 _
 _
 _
 _
 _


[[/div]]

||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/28 Because I work here.]||= 27||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/28 To audit this department.]||

-----

author: TopHatBionicle
